data.actual_result: It causes a blip in the audio twice
data.expected_result: It doesn't stutter, and mutes your mic seamlessly
data.short_description: Muting you mic while someone else is talking causes the audio to stutter twice
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone talk or read you a nice story or something without stopping (easy to repro with a music bot) - Mute your microphone - Hear the other person's lovely voice stutter twice
